
== Information on HARMONIE meteorological model performance: ==

It is envisaged that this information will be provided from 

 * quarterly reports providing information exchange between users of HARMONIE 
   and developers 
 * reports from the developers on the quality of new HARMONIE model cycles. 
 * Illustrative examples of good or poor forecasts
